resources.string: This will reset most personalizations settings to their default values for the current user. Would you like to continue?
Press on color below to apply
View changes in the ROM installed

Rising is an organization that maintains risingOS - a opensource android operating system that aims to bring the necessary system modifications while being neat, stable and fast. Highly inspired by OxygenOS (10-11) and NothingOS.
Rise UI is the user interface skin name of risingOS.

The term \'rising\' is used to describe a person\'s unix desktop where \'ricing\' is an act where someone customizes their desktop such as the changing icons, panels or system interface.\nsource: https://jie-fang.github.io/blog/basics-of-ricing
What happened to the old RisingOS?

Old RisingOS organization got disbanded due to internal conflicts such as making the source private, server rent funds and source management (multiple people were using minaripenguin\'s account for anonymity). The new RisingOSOSS org is now solely maintained by a single source maintainer and distributed officially by official device maintainers.
What is the difference between COMMUNITY and OFFICIAL versions?

COMMUNITY and OFFICIAL versions offers the same amount of features, OFFICIAL versions supports official OTAs straight from official risingOSS organization. Compared to COMMUNITY builds, we always prioritize issues reported and feature requests from OFFICIAL maintainers.
Customize UI colors, icons, fonts etc
Check out if #RisingOS is available for your device @ http://risingoss.github.io/
We love open source, check us out
We are on telegram. Join us!
Get notified of new builds on Telegram
Help with localisation of ROM in your language!
Donate to support server hosting, site uptime and overall management
Found a bug? Ran into an issue?

Smart pixels is a power saving feature. Depending on how many pixels you decide to turn off, you could see improvement in battery life. Note that in some cases it can result in unresponsive areas on touch screen

Reset battery statistics after reaching user defined charging level

Smart Charging allows you to set maximum charging level to extend the lifespan of your battery. When enabled, battery stops charging at Stop trigger level and resumes charging at Start trigger level. Stop trigger level should be always greater than Start trigger level.

Setup icon pack and weather service
Note\u003a you can install new icon packs from play store by searching for \"Chronus icons\"

Tips: 

1. Users can install new icon packs from play store by searching for "Chronus icons".

2. Condition icon pack is used for weather icons on quick settings and sushi launcher at a glance.

3. Long press the QuickSettings weather view/logo/temperature to access weather settings with ease.
Optimize device power consumption and performance
Disable Wi-Fi on screen off when System Manager Aggressive Idle mode is enabled
Disable Bluetooth on screen off when System Manager Aggressive Idle mode is enabled
Disable Mobile data on screen off when System Manager Aggressive Idle mode is enabled
Disable Location on screen off when System Manager Aggressive Idle mode is enabled

Tips: 

1. Game Boost will only activate when a game is active - requires app to be added on GameSpace list.

2. Runtime power mode will override system power mode.

3. Idle Sensor Block will prevent certain motion sensors from working properly.

Display WiFi standard next to WiFi signal
Control Google services and core apps

Before disabling Google services and core apps, you should disable "Find My Device" and 2-step verification on your Google account. It is strongly recommended to keep this setting enabled else apps dependent on Google components will be affected. If you run into any issues after changing this setting, perform a factory reset.
